Blue tit in the rain

Jun 23, 2016

It was early in the morning and it was raining the worms had started to come up, that only meant one thing: that was birds.

Here is a list of what I saw through the upstairs window this morning

  • Wren
  • Starling
  • Black bird
  • and a blue tit on a red hot pocker

Blue tit feeding on a red hot poker

Isaac Sheldrake, Wildlife Blogger
